attributes.action: Petition against the benefit enabled society created over last 10 years
attributes.additional_details:
This petition moves  against individuals that spend their lives living on benefits and constantly taking from society.
With the level of unemployment rising, it is becoming prevalent that a large number of individuals are discovering that it is easier to live on benefits, having their rent, bills and council tax paid for as well as having enough money given to them to live a comfortable lifestyle on. This is while a large number of working families struggle to make ends meet and are in a financially weaker position than those on benefits. This petitions suggests that benefits be decreased and made harder to obtain. With those who remain on them being subject to investigation. This would reduce the countries deficit immensely.
